definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue
fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)

sentences.english: Placing banner advertisements on other webpages is a common form of e-promotion.
sentences.chinese: 在网页上添置广告栏是最普遍的一种促销。

sentences.english: Let me take a look at the want ads.
With reference to your advertisement in (newspaper ) of May 2 for a clerk, I oofer myself for the post.
sentences.chinese: 从五月二日XX报上广告栏得知公司招聘一位职员。

sentences.english: He ran his eyes down the advertisement.
sentences.chinese: 他把他的眼睛顺着广告栏往下扫视。

sentences.english: Recruitment information will be in the network, such as media advertising column contains power.
sentences.chinese: 招聘信息将在网络等电力媒体广告栏登载。

sentences.english: Two weeks ago, a most unusual job was advertised.
sentences.chinese: 两周前，一份最奇怪的工作被刊登在广告栏中。

sentences.english: He began to seek jobs in the classified advertisement column in the newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 他开始从报纸的分类广告栏找工作。

sentences.english: I'm looking for the classified section. Have you seen it?
sentences.chinese: 我正在找分类广告栏，你见到了吗？

sentences.english: I look for the discount store advertised in the leaflet.
sentences.chinese: 我从传单广告栏里寻找减价商店。

definition: bus information board/street sign for a bus stop/bus stop
announcement (written, on billboard, letter, newspaper or website)/to post information/a notice
